title: ARAM RANKED
body: Reato please make this happen! I love your work. {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: Randomness in Ranked? What be this? As if critical chance wasn't enough. I'd say that "ARAM" Ranked would be fairer if champion select was Draft Pick instead of Random Pick.
Yes lets determine your skill at playing any random champion mid lane
lol as you long as you keep teh roll system
